Investor_12.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12.content: Throughout the investment process, I consistently prioritized collaboration, transparency, and effective communication. I established clear expectations with the trustee, maintained proactive engagement, and supported fair profit-sharing. My behavior reinforced my reputation as a trustworthy investor focused on collective success and long-term partnerships.

Trustee_17.name: Fatima Ali
Trustee_17.content: Fatima Ali has demonstrated exceptional integrity and fairness throughout the investment process. Her commitment to transparency and adherence to the agreed allocation plan, including a favorable deviation benefiting me, showcases her dedication to my wealth accumulation. This behavior solidifies her reputation as a reliable and honorable trustee, indicating strong competence and pro-sociality for future collaborations.

Trustee_16.name: Robert Miller
Trustee_16.content: While the trustee complied with the proposed allocation plan, their withholding of an unexpected lower portion of profits raises concerns regarding their integrity and fairness in profit distribution. This inconsistency questions their reliability, suggesting a need for caution in future interactions. Given their lack of established connections and the mixed evaluation of their actions, their reputation appears uncertain and warrants careful consideration in subsequent engagements.

Trustee_14.name: Juan Carlos Reyes
Trustee_14.content: The trustee has exhibited high levels of integrity and fairness throughout the investment process. By distributing a greater share of profits to me than initially proposed, this demonstrates their commitment to prioritizing the investor's interests. Such behavior enhances their reputation significantly, showcasing transparency and equitable resource distribution, which are foundational for successful future collaborations.

Trustee_12.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12.content: I have demonstrated high levels of trustworthiness and pro-sociality by adhering to the agreed-upon allocation plan, ensuring transparency and fairness in profit distribution. My commitment to integrity and reliability has fostered a collaborative atmosphere, enhancing my reputation as a dedicated trustee focused on long-term partnerships. Given my consistent acceptance rate of 4.0 in previous investments, this process strengthens my standing in the community.

Investor_3.name: Maria Rossi
Investor_3.content: Maria has engaged positively throughout the investment process, showing a commitment to our mutual success and adhering to the agreed framework. Her willingness to engage without prior experience reflects a pro-social nature, thus enhancing her reputation. The established bidirectional connections with 2 other investors indicate her growing presence and potential for cooperative behavior in the community.
